fig.label: Figure 4.

caption.p:
Annual estimates of the
R 0
multimodel mean and the climate model variability (95% confidence interval) for Ontario south of 50Â°N (left) and Nova Scotia (right).

fig.alt-text: Two shaded line graphs show R0 values (y-axis) for the years 1914, 1940, 1967, 1993, 2010, 2046, 2073, and 2099 (x-axis) for Southern Ontario and Nova Scotia. The simulation lines indicate historical period, RCP26, RCP45, RCP60, and RCP80.
